Stream Tiered Assessment Framework

Tier Selector

Back to Home

Use the questions below to pick a tier that matches your decision context. The goal is to align level of effort with risk, number of sites, and the type of decision you need to support.

Use this quick guide to choose a tier based on effort and decision risk:

  • Screening: many sites, low risk, desktop data.
  • Rapid: moderate risk, field day per site.
  • Detailed: high risk, intensive data and calibration.

Screening tier | Rapid tier | Detailed tier

What to do next

Choose a tier page to see workflows, outputs, and example resources.
